amendment.description: To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, $4,500,000 for development of the Suicide Bomber Detection System Using a Portable Electronic Scanning Millimeter-Wave Imaging RADAR.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3528 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3528 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S7379-7380; text: CR S7380) To make available, from amounts appropriated for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Defense-Wide, $4,500,000 for development of the Suicide Bomber Detection System Using a Portable Electronic Scanning Millimeter-Wave Imaging RADAR.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3528 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3528 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer.
